section.title: generateReceipt(pizzaOrder)
section.p: Input: pizzaOrder list as described in .
Output: prints receipt to standard output. Returns None.
section.codeblock:
from pizzaReceipt import generateReceipt
pizzaOrder = [ ['S', ['PEPPERONI', 'ONION']], ['L', ['HAM', 'BACON', 'ONION', 'TOMATO']], ]
generateReceipt(pizzaOrder)
